moderately hypertrophied.context: The adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied.

Adenoid curettes.context: Adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.

packs.context: Adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.

right tonsil.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

curved Allis.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

gold laser.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

anterior tonsillar pillar incised.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

superior pole.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

inferior pole.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

tonsillar muscular bed.context: Next, the right tonsil was grasped with a curved Allis and, using the gold laser, the anterior tonsillar pillar incised and, with this laser, dissection carried from the superior pole to the inferior pole and removed off the tonsillar muscular bed.

contralateral tonsil.context: A similar procedure was performed on the contralateral tonsil.

hemostasis.context: Following meticulous hemostasis, saline was used to irrigate and no further bleeding noted.

stable condition.context: The patient was then allowed to awaken and was brought to the recovery room in stable condition.
